post.body: crack me up!My girls didnt quite go thru terible 2's, but sassy mouth 3's hit us hard! Jst wait-u'll-C! Its a girl thing.
i checked it out and there r tweeps on there that r not parents of multiples. Tweeting ronchy stuff unrelated 2 parenting?
it was in high 70's here in Dallas yesterday. Now its 52 & very windy! once sun is down we may get our 1st freeze!Brrr!
took my 8 yr old twingirls 2 the 3D Bolt movie-they loved it! Was not their 1st movie.
envy the 8:30 bdtime! U go girl! Don't think i've done that n at lest 10 yrs! Why did u chage ur name?U weren't that scary.
Siting in carpool line w/Sydnee waitin 4 twins 2 get out of schol. Watchin Frosty the snowman on DVD. its 30 degrees out! Wish it'd snow!
Totally worth it 2 pay for someone else to put up the Xmas lights this yr&probably from now on. Plus r lawn guy gets xtra $ on off season!
Debating buying more Xmas decor 4 frnt yard. Entire house, flowerbeds,etc. Covered in classic white lights. Girls' said looks boring. Ugh!
Hi&bye, tryin 2 get off computer 2 go try & get some sleep!! working on girls' b-day party invites & Xmas cards! UGH! OK...goodnight tweeps!
browsing around at http://www.twittermoms.com -- join me!
RT @shoemoney is giving away a $500 #Kmart Gift Card on his blog - simply tweet or comment to enter http://urlbrief.com/d9366c
browsing around at http://www.twittermoms.com -- join me!
Obama is anouncing natl security tm rt now& interuptedTVshow on Xmas shopping ideas.i admidt im irritated. Why now?Hillary C looks P.O'd too
Cant believe Dec. is here! Twins' b-day is wknd before Xmas.Still have not planned a party.this time of year brings me much anxiety. Ideas?
off 2 bed twitter friends! up early tomorrow 2 attempt 2 cleanout & organize girls' playrm! twins' bday is n Dec & time 2 donate ol'toys
just changed my twitter name to twinmomntx..from cksmith..so my tweeps pls continue to follow! www.seedsinmyheartbycami.blogspot.com thx!
I need some ideas for my id. twin girls' 9th B-day party. Including at least 10 of their friends. Any thoughts? If so please share. thnx!
ey won't cover Syd's needed speech theraphy. Worried about Obama as president! Now what? Zoe just crapped on oriental rug again in dinin ...
EADY! Ahhhh I'm tired!
at night down to low 40's. Syd falls & cuts her leg, K-whining its not fair L doesn't have 2 go 2 school, DH tells me insurance premium ...
2days in counting till my twin girls turn 9yrs old. They asked if they could have a sleepover bday party @ a fancyhotel?! Hello tween yrs-
I jst got a MOMAGENDA.(appt.calender bk till2010)jst cant find time 2 transfer all my 2 do's&appts! wishin 2 get a hold of my crazylife ...
